评论详情: I love the necklace.  It is perfect for the time of year.  Quality is better than I expected.  Crystals are cute and tasteful.  Hangs at the perfect length.  I wore it with a black sweatshirt over the weekend for a Halloween event and it looked great! Price is great too.  Love all the color selections.

I actually bought this necklace a 2nd time in a different color so my cousin. She absolutely loves pink and spooky stuff so now we have matching necklaces. It's so cute 💜 I have had mine for almost a year now and it hasn't broken, no metal discoloration or any issues. 100000% love it

First of all update your product name. A spider is not a reptile. Second, your product description claims to be hypoallergenic yet I've noticed itching since this morning (its been on for only 2 days). I am allergic to nickel, the most common allergy to consider when making hypoallergenic jewelry. Please update to reflect your product accurately.
There are parts of the metal that are dull and not silver. I get this is a cheap item and for the price I'll keep as it just for a Halloween costume.
Bought this for my sister in law who is a D.J. and Spider is her business name. She loved it. Well crafted.
Pretty and my daughter loves it.
It's exactly like the picture and is really cute, it's my new favorite necklace right now!
Perfect for the costume, good quality.  Happy with purchase!
this necklace broke the first day i bought it, not worth the money!!
I ordered this for my halloween costume i got the gold and silver pair, the silver came fine but the gold came broken and different size and color.
Item as described. I originally thought it didn't come with my order but I found it thrown in the bottom of the bag.
Love the design

The first necklace I received was missing the stone in the center of the spider.  I contacted the company and filled in a return refund/exchange form.  Before I could even drop the defective necklace at UPS store the following day, I received the replacement necklace in the mail that same day.  The necklace is exactly what I wanted.
Though bargain COSTUME jewelry not worth any amt if defective
This is awesome,  just wish the red was a deep blood red. Other than that great necklace!
Very pretty. It is perfect for a fun party or just to wear daily. I enjoy it. Very nice for the cost.
I needed a statement necklace to go with a turtleneck I just bought, I decided on this one and I'm glad I did ♥ I bought some web earrings to go with it and it's a fantastic look.
Really neat item.  I got it for a spooky theme but I think it would be great to wear anytime.  I was not expecting it to be as nice but it was.  I would recommend this.  Enjoy.

It was smaller than pictured & snapped in half while I was trying to put it on. 0/5 would not recommend.

The necklace is cute but it arrived broken. I was able to fix it easily enough but was not able to give a gift as intended. I had to promise to fix it when I had the tools. Nothing hard to do but the gift couldn't be worn immediately.  Just an annoyance.
It is really pretty necklace. I will wear it even after Halloween.
This is a great jewelry piece and worked great for Halloween. I like that it is adjustable and the stones on there are beautiful.

I absolutely love it. The quality is on the cheaper side, so do be careful with it. I suggest buying one or two spares.
